name: Crafted_Pacing_of_the_Turtle_E
display_name: Crafted Pacing of the Turtle E
display_fullname: Boosts.Crafted Pacing of the Turtle E
display_help: Enhances the slowing ability of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
